control.name: Responsive button
control.helpHtml: A version of the button control that offers responsive design through the use of a set of dropdowns. Different styles of button can also be selected. The different width options will alter the size of the button depending on the page size. Pages are broken into grids 12 columns wide.

property.name: Name
property.helpHtml: Name that can be given to the control. Names are used to help identify controls uniquely.

property.name: Label
property.helpHtml: Text to appear on the button.

property.name: Title
property.helpHtml: Displays a message when hovered over. Useful for screen readers.

property.name: Glyph
property.helpHtml: Attaches a glyph to the button. Useful for adding extra direction or improving aesthetics of a button, such as adding a magnifying glass for searching.

property.name: Glyph position
property.helpHtml: Sets the position of the glyph on the button.

property.name: Glyph background
property.helpHtml: Applies an additional style to the glyph.
